name: 林含怡
objective: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction
Week 2: Overview of Verb Tenses I
Week 3: Overview of Verb Tenses II 
Week 4: Subject-Verb Agreement
Week 5: Nouns
Week 6: Pronouns
Week 7: Modal, Part 1
Week 8: Modal, Part 2
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: The Passive
Week 11: Adjective Clauses
Week 12: Gerunds and Infinitives, Part 1
Week 13: Gerunds and Infinitives, Part 2
Week 14: Coordinating Conjunctions
Week 15: Adverb Clauses
Week 16: No Class
Week 17: Reduction of Adverb Clauses to Modifying Adverbial Phrases
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance & participation 10%
Individual reports 15%
Assignments, quizzes & class activities 25%
Midterm exam 25%
Final exam 25%
materials: Azar, B.S. & Hagen S.A. (2009) Understanding and Using English Grammar (4th ed.). New York: Pearson Education.
